billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

title: Extends the applicability of a certain provision in the Patriot Plan relating to the suspension of public retirement system loan repayment obligations
summary: Extends the applicability of a certain provision in the Patriot Plan relating to the suspension of public retirement system loan repayment obligations.
currentCommittee: VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1873

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 13, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by Sen. ESPAILLAT -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Veterans, Homeland Securi-
         ty and Military Affairs

       AN ACT to amend chapter 106 of the laws of 2003, constituting the Patri-
         ot  Plan,  in  relation  to extending the applicability of a provision
         thereof for the suspension of public retirement system loan  repayment
         obligations

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The opening paragraph of section 43 of chapter 106  of  the
    2  laws  of  2003, constituting the Patriot Plan, as amended by chapter 133
    3  of the laws of 2008, is amended to read as follows:
    4    This act  shall  take  effect  immediately;  provided,  however,  that
    5  section  forty-two  of  this  act  shall be deemed repealed [seven] NINE
    6  years after it shall have become a law; provided further that:
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately, except that if  this  act
    8  shall  become  a law on or after July 1, 2010 this act shall take effect
    9  immediately and shall be deemed to have been in full force and effect on
   10  and after July 1, 2010.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06300-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 106 of the laws of 2003, constituting the Patriot Plan, in relation to extending the applicability of a provision thereof for the suspension of public retirement system loan repayment obligations
